answers.answer: the pre-operational space system shall be available in 2013

que_3.question: What will perform on-board software management functions ?

answers.answer: on-board storage of software in non-modifiable memories ( rom ) shall be limited to the strict necessary ( e.g. boot sw ) such that software corrections/updates can be made when the satellite is in orbit
